extendedInfo.description: Do you want to know the energy consumption of your devices in your home? Forgot to switch off your coffee machine? Or do you want to remotely turn on your lights before you arrive at home?With DELTA Comfort Wijzer for Android, you get insights and are in control!V1.1 features:-	Added support for central metersV1.0 features:-	Turn Smart Plugs On / Off-	Check the status of your devices-	Monitor the Energy consumption of your devices-	View kWh, â¬, CO2 per day, week, month or year-	View historical energy consumption graphs up to 15 minute time intervalsDELTA Comfort Wijzer for Windows Phone can only be used in combination with a DELTA Comfort Wijzer energy management system with smart plugs or with a connection to a smart meter. For more information, visit www.DELTA.nl/ComfortWijzer
